profile: Welcome to 365 Installation Services Inc. Call us or visit our website. We know renovations are costly and timely and that is why we value being transparent while insightful so you're able to make the best decision about your project. Get An Instant Quote www.365installation.com 365 Installation Services provides: Stairs: -New Stair Capping -Stair Recapping -Stairs Refinishing -Handrail Refinishing -New Railing & Spindles Install -Custom Two Tone Finishes Flooring: (Material and/or Installation) - Prefinished Hardwood - Unfinished Hardwood - Laminate - Engineered Hardwood - Vinyl Plank We Service All Of The GTA & Surrounding Areas Check us out here: http://www.365installation.com/ https://www.facebook.com/365InstallationServices/ https://www.instagram.com/365installationservices/ ​

profile:
Family Owned Exel Flooring has been known for quality services, exceptional efficiency and the highest level of professionalism. We make sure that customer satisfaction is always our first priority.  With over 25 years of experience, every job is done right all the time.
Exel Flooring offers products for all of your flooring needs.  We sell and install every type of carpet, hardwood, laminate, and vinyl of your choice. We have custom pattern and designs for your preferences. Give us a call or contact us by email and we will give you a free estimate. 

Exel Flooring has the most reliable and trusted installation and sales teams in the industry.

Contact us for our monthly carpet & flooring sales happening every month!

Visit our showroom or shop at home to view all of our incredible samples. 

Services:
Residential & commercial

​Carpet
Carpet repair
Carpet Stairs 
Hardwood flooring
Laminate flooring
Vinyl flooring

11 Harwood Ave S, Ajax
905-428-6000
services:
Carpet installation & repairs
Carpet stair installation 
Hardwood installation 
Laminate Installation 
Vinyl Installation
